overview:
LVS Ltd., a subsidiary of Française des Jeux (FDJ), delivers modern and open sports betting and gaming solutions based on the Advanced Betting Platform (ABP), which enables bets on any kind of sport and markets, live betting, multiple price lines on any kind of digital and retail channel, state of the art risk management and cost efficient operation.

ABP is in permanent evolution as LVS invests continuously in R&D. ABP now includes a web and CMS framework for desktop, mobile and tablet channels, traditional and innovative solutions for retail distribution, a promotion engine and additional games such as sports pooled games and keno games.

Since its inception in 1992, LVS has been a leading provider to sportsbook operators across the globe. The team at LVS comprises of a blend of highly experienced industry and technical professionals who are focussed on delivering cutting edge solutions.

Now, with the firm backing of La Française Des Jeux (FDJ), LVS is accelerating growth by delivering products of unprecedented quality to the gaming industry.
